game.title: The Dragon's Treasure
game.description: You will set out on a perilous journey to the Dragon's Lair. Your objective is to retrieve the treasure that the Dragon has been hoarding for years. Beware, the Dragon is very protective of its treasure.
game.reward: 5000 Gold and a Dragon Scale Shield

task.description: Travel through the treacherous mountain pass to reach the Dragon's Lair.
Once you have reached the lair, you must retrieve the treasure without waking the dragon.
